shortdesc.ph: 使用 User Account 加入频道，并设置是否自动订阅音频或视频流。

p.codeblock: public abstract int joinChannelWithUserAccountEx(String token, String channelId, String userAccount, ChannelMediaOptions options, IRtcEngineEventHandler eventHandler);

- (int)joinChannelExByToken:(NSString* _Nullable)token channelId:(NSString* _Nonnull)channelId userAccount:(NSString* _Nonnull)userAccount delegate:(id<AgoraRtcEngineDelegate> _Nullable)delegate mediaOptions:(AgoraRtcChannelMediaOptions* _Nonnull)mediaOptions joinSuccess:(void(^ _Nullable)(NSString* _Nonnull channel, NSUInteger uid, NSInteger elapsed))joinSuccessBlock;
abstract joinChannelWithUserAccountEx(token: string, channelId: string, userAccount: string, options: ChannelMediaOptions): number;
public abstract int JoinChannelWithUserAccountEx(string token, string channelId, string userAccount, ChannelMediaOptions options, IAgoraRtcEngineEventHandler eventHandler);
